results.content: If you are new to PHP Coding like I was and like things explained to you in a progression you will get a lot out of this class.

results.content:
I really liked this course, it matched my expectation and this course  really taught me, how PHP works. This course has everything which a beginner need. And Anil sir is great knowledgable person, he beautifully explain all the things and most importantly you never get bored in this course.

Thank you Anil sir for helping me always :) . And Thank you Coders GUID for this beautiful course.
